messages.text: which planet is known as the red planet

[2]The main point is Mars, also known as the Red Planet. It got its name due to its reddish appearance caused by iron oxide (rust) on its surface. Mars has been of interest to humans for a long time and has been explored through various missions, such as the Mars rovers.

RAG stands for "Retrieval Augmented Language Model." It refers to a computational technique that combines pre-training with retrieval and generation tasks. The goal of RAG is to improve language models by leveraging external data sources during both the training and inference stages. This approach allows the model to learn from diverse sources of information, resulting in more accurate and comprehensive outputs.
